Name: Funeral Doll Marked with Dots
Description: The funeral doll depicts a standing nude woman. Her legs are joined and her hands are placed on her thighs. Her hair is in two long ponytails hanging to her shoulders. Her eyes are marked by two black dots beside a small nose. The face and the neck are all one piece. Her breasts, in the shape of two cones, and her navel, are surrounded with dots. A string of beads marked by a dotted line encircles her hips.
